document_data.name: Battlestars at Tilver's Gap
document_data.mainbody: '''''Battlestars at Tilver's Gap''''' was a ballad about a historic battle against an [[orc]]ish horde that took place in western [[Cormanthyr]] and the [[Dalelands]] in the 7{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Contents: The ballad titled ''Battlestars at Tilver's Gap'' retold the events of the {{YearlinkName|619}}, when a horde of work from the [[Thunder Peaks]] swarmed onto the lands of western Cormanthyr and the Dalelands, threatening [[Semberholme]]. The titular Battlestars were an army of the Dalesmen and elves of [[Myth Drannor]] who stood against the encroaching horde and obliterated it in a fearsome battle.
